title: (x) Sans titles in "Love Songs" movie trailer - Arial {J. Edward Sanchez}
content:
Hi

I´m not sure about this font. I tried Akzidenz, but the “S” is slightly different for example

THANKS very much in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080327211549im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cc_3785.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080327211549im_/http:/typophile.com/files/dd_6627.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080327211549im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ee_3837.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080327211549im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ff_5348.jpg)

 [‹ (x) 80s Golden State Warriors slab serif - Aachen {Thomas Phinney}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080327211549/http:/typophile.com/node/43516 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Geometric sans used in "Pandora's Box" DVD menu (Criterion Collection) - Bayer Sans {James Mark Hatley} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080327211549/http:/typophile.com/node/43520 "Go to next forum topic")
author: candlebougie

comments.content: Yes. What a shame. The flaccid ’R’ gives it away.
:-))) THANKS. I totally forgot about Arial!
Not to mention the typical G
